statements: SELECT * FROM lighting_schedule WHERE user_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT schedule_id, start_time, end_time FROM lighting_schedule WHERE light_intensity > 50;
SELECT schedule_id, user_id, start_time, end_time, light_intensity, repeat_weekdays FROM lighting_schedule WHERE start_time >= '2022-03-15' ORDER BY light_intensity DESC;
SELECT * FROM lighting_schedule WHERE repeat_weekdays @> ARRAY['Monday'];
SELECT schedule_id, user_id, start_time, end_time FROM lighting_schedule WHERE user_id = '87654321-4321-4321-4321-210987654321' AND light_intensity < 40;
SELECT * FROM lighting_schedule WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY start_time DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT schedule_id, start_time, end_time FROM lighting_schedule WHERE light_intensity > 50 ORDER BY end_time ASC
SELECT user_id, start_time, end_time, light_intensity FROM lighting_schedule WHERE repeat_weekdays @> ARRAY['Monday'] AND light_intensity BETWEEN 40 AND 60
SELECT schedule_id, user_id, start_time, end_time FROM lighting_schedule WHERE end_time > '2022-01-15' AND start_time < '2022-01-20' ORDER BY start_time
SELECT * FROM lighting_schedule WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND end_time - start_time > INTERVAL '1 hour'
SELECT user_name, timezone FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, user_name, timezone FROM users WHERE user_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS schedule_count FROM lighting_schedule GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, intensity FROM lighting_schedule WHERE days_active = 'Weekdays' ORDER BY intensity DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, timezone FROM users ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM lighting_schedule WHERE intensity > 50 ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT user_name, start_time, intensity FROM users JOIN lighting_schedule ON users.user_id = lighting_schedule.user_id WHERE user_name = 'Alice';
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM lighting_schedule WHERE days_active LIKE '%Monday%' AND intensity BETWEEN 30 AND 70;
SELECT * FROM LightingSchedule;
SELECT schedule_id, user_id, start_time, end_time, days_of_week FROM LightingSchedule WHERE days_of_week @> ARRAY['Monday']
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences WHERE preferred_brightness > 50;
SELECT user_id, preferred_start_time, preferred_end_time FROM UserPreferences WHERE notification_enabled = true;
SELECT location, sensor_type, status FROM LightSensors WHERE location = 'Living Room';
SELECT schedule_id, user_id, start_time, end_time, days_of_week FROM LightingSchedule WHERE user_id = 1 AND start_time >= '08:00:00' AND end_time <= '18:00:00' ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, preferred_brightness, notification_enabled FROM UserPreferences WHERE preferred_start_time >= '06:00:00' AND preferred_end_time <= '10:00:00';
SELECT sensor_id, location, sensor_type FROM LightSensors WHERE status = true ORDER BY sensor_id ASC;
SELECT schedule_id, user_id, start_time, end_time, days_of_week FROM LightingSchedule WHERE days_of_week @> ARRAY['Monday'] AND start_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00';
SELECT user_id, preferred_brightness, notification_enabled FROM UserPreferences WHERE preferred_start_time < preferred_end_time;
SELECT id, start_time, end_time FROM LightingSchedule;
SELECT user_id, start_time, light_intensity FROM LightingSchedule ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT id, location_name FROM Locations WHERE timezone='UTC';
SELECT name, email FROM Users WHERE id=1;
SELECT user_id, bright_level FROM Preferences WHERE schedule_id=3;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT id, name FROM Users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT location_name, timezone FROM Locations WHERE timezone = 'PST';
SELECT schedule_id, start_time, end_time FROM LightingSchedule WHERE light_intensity > 50 ORDER BY start_time DESC;

SELECT Users.name, LightingSchedule.start_time, Preferences.bright_level FROM Users JOIN LightingSchedule ON Users.id = LightingSchedule.user_id JOIN Preferences ON Users.id = Preferences.user_id WHERE Preferences.bright_level = 100 ORDER BY LightingSchedule.start_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences;
SELECT user_id, preferred_lighting_mode FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM LightingSchedule WHERE lighting_mode = 'Day';
SELECT room_name, number_of_lights, light_location FROM RoomLayout WHERE room_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM LightingLogs WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences
SELECT user_id, start_time, end_time FROM UserPreferences WHERE preferred_lighting_mode = 'Bright'
SELECT * FROM LightingSchedule WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday'
SELECT room_name, light_intensity FROM RoomLayout ORDER BY light_intensity DESC
SELECT user_id, room_id, event_timestamp FROM LightingLogs WHERE log_details LIKE '%error%'
